title: Cefiderocol susceptibility endows hope in treating carbapenem-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa: insights from in vitro and in silico evidence
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21328-21341
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04302B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Soumya Basu, Gayathri Ashok, Soumyadip Ghosh, Sudha Ramaiah, Balaji Veeraraghavan, Anand Anbarasu
Clinical carbapenemase-positive Pseudomonas aeruginosa strains showing pan-β-lactam resistance had stabilizing mutations in penicillin-binding protein-3. Cefiderocol however showed efficacy with low MIC-values due to multi-target specificity.
